```{r}
library(readxl)
library(ganttrify)
library(tidyverse)

data <- read_excel("data/data.xlsx") %>% 
  mutate(start_date = as.Date(start_date),
         end_date = as.Date(end_date))


ganttrify(project = data,
          by_date = TRUE,
          exact_date = TRUE,
          size_text_relative = 1.2,
          month_number_label = FALSE,
          font_family = "Roboto Condensed")

```
